DeepAnalysis::Cluster

DeepAnalysis::Cluster Class Reference

Cluster is the main object to work with and to keep the main results of the analisys Cluster consists of its properties: like parameters of the inertia tensor, average density, whole volume, a few topological Chisq and pointers to first and last hits in cluster. More...

#include <DeepAnalysis.hh>

Detailed Description

Cluster is the main object to work with and to keep the main results of the analisys Cluster consists of its properties: like parameters of the inertia tensor, average density, whole volume, a few topological Chisq and pointers to first and last hits in cluster.
